welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.sentence1: Welcome to the Breaking Bad Wiki Lite version.
welcome.sentence2: In this mini app you will be able to see information about the characters of one of the best and famous series in the history.
welcome.sentence3: This app is still in progress.
